text: Payback (2014) is a professional wrestling pay-per-view (PPV) and livestreaming show made by WWE. It took place on May 4, 2014 at the Allstate Arena in Rosemont, Illinois. It was the second Payback event held by WWE and the first to also stream live on the WWE Network. ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 El Torito (with Diego and Fernando) defeated Hornswoggle (with Heath Slater, Jinder Mahal, and Drew McIntyre) Mask vs. Hair match 7:10 2 Sheamus (c) defeated Cesaro (with Paul Heyman) Singles match for the WWE United States Championship 11:38 3 RybAxel (Ryback and Curtis Axel) defeated Cody Rhodes and Goldust) Tag team match 7:49 4 Rusev (with Lana) defeated Big E by submission Singles match 3:40 5 Bo Dallas vs. Kofi Kingston ended in a no contest Singles match 0:32 6 Bad News Barrett (c) defeated Rob Van Dam Singles match for the WWE Intercontinental Championship 9:32 7 John Cena (with Jimmy and Jey Uso) defeated Bray Wyatt (with Luke Harper and Erick Rowan) Last Man Standing match 24:14 8 Paige (c) defeated Alicia Fox by submission Singles match for the WWE Divas Championship 6:37 9 The Shield (Dean Ambrose, Seth Rollins and Roman Reigns) defeated Evolution (Triple H, Randy Orton and Batista) No Holds Barred Elimination match 30:56 (c) – is the champion(s) going into the match P – This match took place on the pre-show === No Holds Barred six-man elimination tag team match === Elimination Wrestler Team Eliminated by Elimination move Times 1 Batista Evolution Seth Rollins Pinned after a Spear from Reigns 27:32 2 Randy Orton Dean Ambrose Pinned after a Dirty Deeds on a chair 28:37 3 Triple H Roman Reigns high knee from Rollins and a Spear 30:56 Winner(s): The Shield == References == Category:2014 in professional wrestling Category:WWE Payback Category:2014 in Illinois Category:June 2014 events
title: Payback (2014)
